actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that unmarried individuals shall be subject to the same income tax rates as married individuals filing joint returns.

summary.text: Provides under the Internal Revenue Code that unmarried individuals shall be subject to the same income tax rates as married individuals filing joint returns.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that unmarried individuals shall be subject to the same income tax rates as married individuals filing joint returns.
